title: Write Your Genius, Genius! A Rather Quick Guide to Book Writing
description: Do you want to write a book? Are you not quite sure where or how to begin? Author and editor Nadine Keels will help you reach your launching point with this simple and insightful guide. You'll discover just how possible it is to tap into your genius and give voice to the message within you that's waiting to get out into the open. You'll never view your writing, or yourself, in the same way again!
author: Nadine C. Keels
